summary: SummaryCelebration Foundation Illumination by IT Cosmetics gives you the ability to create a flawless, illuminized finish, all in less than 30 seconds!
details: DetailsFeaturesGives you the ability to create a flawless, illuminized finish, all in less than 30 seconds!It's truly 30 seconds to full coverage and illumination to your skin!Anyone who wants a lit-from-within glow without the use of glitter or shimmer!BenefitsFeatures the same good for you, skin loving ingredients you have come to know and love with original Celebration Foundation, such as hydrolyzed collagen, peptides, anti-oxidants and Drops of Light Technology, just to name a few.Skin-enhancing formula means less is more to achieve your desired level of buildable coverage.Talc free, paraben free, sodium lauryl sulfate free, mineral oil free, petrolatum free, synthetic fragrance free, phthalates free, cruelty freeItem 2269897How To UseUsing the Heavenly Luxe Double Airbrush Foundation Brush Brush gently swirl circles into powder then sweep gently onto skin in circular motions to expertly distribute a natural look of luminization with a flawless, soft-focus, airbrush finish. Skin-enhancing formula means less is more to achieve your desired level of buildable coverage.Beauty tips: Buff in circular sweeping motions then downward and outward for natural looking application using the Heavenly Luxe Dual Airbrush Foundation/Concealer Brush or the Flat Top Foundation Brush. Carry this easy-to-use compact in your purse for easy touch-ups on the go!IngredientsMica, Titanium Dioxide, Zinc Oxide, Lauroyl Lysine, Zinc Stearate, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Aqua (Water, Eau), Silica, Niacinamide, Retinyl Palmitate, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Serica / Silk Powder / Poudre De Soie, Tocopherol, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Palmitoyl Tripeptide - 1, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide - 7, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Hyaluronic Acid, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Camellia Oleifera Leaf Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Carica Papaya Fruit Extract, Vitis Vinifera Seed Extract, Chamomilla Recutita Flower Extract, Olea Europaea Fruit Extract, Punica Granatum Extract, Rosa Canina Fruit Extract, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Carbomer, Polysorbate 20, Cholesteryl Chloride, Cholesteryl Nonanoate, Cholesteryl Oleyl Carbonate, Phenoxyethanol, BHT. May Contain: Iron Oxides (CI 77499, CI 77491, CI 77492).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Using the Heavenly Luxe Double Airbrush Foundation Brush Brush gently swirl circles into powder then sweep gently onto skin in circular motions to expertly distribute a natural look of luminization with a flawless, soft-focus, airbrush finish. Skin-enhancing formula means less is more to achieve your desired level of buildable coverage.Beauty tips: Buff in circular sweeping motions then downward and outward for natural looking application using the Heavenly Luxe Dual Airbrush Foundation/Concealer Brush or the Flat Top Foundation Brush. Carry this easy-to-use compact in your purse for easy touch-ups on the go!
ingredients: Serica / Silk Powder / Poudre De Soie

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: Are use this product for quite a few years, it's definitely a cover-up, but not total cover-up. And it's light enough that I use it daily.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again and again.
reviews.comments: I love this product, I would recommend this brand to everyone.

reviews.headline: My only foundation I use now!
reviews.comments: This is perfect for normal dry skin. I apply with a flat brush it gives coverage and dewy effect.

reviews.headline: I just love this product!!!
reviews.comments: I like how it covers and it doesn't take much for coverage. It's very lightweight too. It's the best shade for my face and blends well with my skin. I just absolutely love it. Would be nice if it went on sale. I would stock up.

reviews.headline: I won't leave the house without it!
reviews.comments: This powder is amazing!  It makes my skin glow!

reviews.headline: I loved
reviews.comments: The best product

reviews.headline: Loved it will buy again
reviews.comments: Love the coverage and so easy to apply.

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: Always loved this product. Been using it for years!❤️❤️❤️

reviews.headline: MY FAVORITE!
reviews.comments: It is pricey but I try to buy a couple when it is on sale. THIS is my go to, especially in the summer when it is too hot to wear liquid makeup. PLUS I can touch up during the day with no fuss & no marks or lines where you touched up. I like the little bit of radiance, it makes your skin look more alive & fresh.  I will keep buying this as long as they keep making it. It gives the look of good skin.

reviews.headline: Beat foundation
reviews.comments: I've used this foundation for several years now.  Totally gives me a different look rather than using liquid .  Leaves me face smooth looking and flawless.  Love it

reviews.headline: Good, but...
reviews.comments: I love the powder and coverage, but I wish there were more tone offerings. I am pretty good in the shade I have but it is too warm for me. I am cool and this is way too warm. I might consider trying the light to see how it looks, since in some lighting I feel like I could almost use this powder as a bronzer. This shade is the closest my skin has ever looked to tanned.

reviews.headline: No
reviews.comments: I didn't realize it was shimmer i was looking for regular powder

reviews.headline: Formula change
reviews.comments: I've been wearing this for years and the formula has definitely changed despite what IT is saying.  I agree with the many others noticing the formula change.  It's not only sparkly, it's dry, flaky and no longer smooth, silky with the right illumination.   I have an old one and  I can feel the difference when put side by side.  It's  offensive when It tells you it's not same when it's clearly not.  Just be honest if there's a change.  I have 2 new ones that I will discard.  This is really drying

reviews.headline: Feels like silk.
reviews.comments: Gave me perfect light weight coverage that made my skin feel soft as silk. This did not sink into or accent the wrinkles of my 68 yr old skin. Never going back to liquid or cream foundations again.  I have purchased this twice.

reviews.headline: This foundation is magic.
reviews.comments:
This powder is a game changer. Easy to apply, buildable coverage, flawless finish.
I highly recommend this product for redness, and facial veins.
Thank you IT.

reviews.headline: My Fav!!
reviews.comments: This foundation covers well and lasts all day. I have sensitive skin this product has never given me a problem. It goes on quick and easy. There is no blending or caking at all with this product. It is light on the skin.

reviews.headline: Wonderful
reviews.comments: This formula is the best iv used. My skin looks brighter and the coverage is awesome. I have finally found something that works for skin.

reviews.headline: I will buy it again
reviews.comments: I love it

reviews.headline: Perfect skin.
reviews.comments: First time using this product and I am extremely happy. Looks flawless like the perfect skin.

reviews.headline: I have bought this product multiple times and love it!
reviews.comments: This foundation is light and gives smooth coverage. I am a mature woman with age spots on my face. While I do need additional coverage for under eyes and dark spots, IT foundation blends well and gives an overall fresh, youthful look. IT foundation is my go-to foundation.

Got My Life Back
media.caption: This is me before IT Cosmetics Celebration Foundation Illumination changed my life

faceoff_positive.comments: I've been using very expensive liquid foundations for years and never thought to use a powder form. I don't like the feel of makeup on my face and I also felt it would sink into my wrinkles, until I tried this. My skin is so even and glowing when I wear this! It feels like I have nothing on! I also get compliments from my closest friends as well as strangers. I threw away all the other foundations and will only wear this one from now on! I feel so confident and pretty at 60! Thank you It Cosmetics!!
faceoff_positive.headline: In Love!

faceoff_negative.comments: Okay the powder is very soft and buttery, that I love about it. With the right density brush the coverage is nice. The tester in the store was not nearly as shimmery as the one I bought. It almost appeared as if I was putting highlighter all over my face. My pores were huge and I did use a pore filling primer.
faceoff_negative.headline: Pores pores pores
